entry.source: You activated yet another Terminal? Do you{F801}realize that makes {F804,5}eight{F804,0} of them thus far?{F801}Your tenacity in completing this quest is most{F801}impressive, but I personally am tiring of hearing{F801}the word "Terminal." Still, please keep up the{F801}hard work.{F801}

entry.source: You activated yet another Terminal? Do you{F801}realize that makes {F804,5}nine{F804,0} of them thus far?{F801}I'm at my wit's end... Pardon me for being abrupt,{F801}but {F804,5}when you find the next Terminal,{F804,0} I will{F801}consider {F804,5}this quest complete.{F804,0} We cannot while{F801}away all our time on finding Terminals, after all.{F801}
